name: Lost - Demo (Jonathan314)
description:
The goal of the game is to work from stages of depression  to lighter ones meeting other characters, build a community. It is adventure and problem-solving based.

CONTROLS

Move Left and Right : A and D

Jump : Spacebar

Go to next Text : Any Key or Mouse Click

CREDITS

Jonathan Lan

George Obasuyi

Eureka Liu

Valerie Lehar

Olli Zelek
